channel.title: Redash database governance
channel.description:
I try to grant user permission to work on Redash. The issue is if i grant them admin permission, they can see all the database in delta lake. If i grant them user(non-admin permission), they can only see very few database in delta lake. I am wondering what configuration should i set for non-admin users to see all the database in delta lake?
Thanks

item.title: Redash database governance
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
